dimensions: Warp x Weft: 121.9 x 63.5 cm (48 x 25 in.)
title: Textile
medium:
Block-printed on linen
Medium: linen
Technique: wood block printed on plain weave
description: Natural color linen, block-printed in black and soft shades of red and light green, now faded.  Design shows part of a symmetrical ogival frame pattern, in imitation of a woven silk or velvet. Each ogive contains the head of a large, exotic flower. The framing bands are heavily printed in black, and contain interior decoration of flower heads and curving stems.  The repeat is incomplete.
name: Textile
